text: Wow. Seems itâ€™s not made to sync data from an external DB into HubSpot, or am I wrong?

OMNI Channel Messaging Extension for HubSpot

<https://help.oapps.xyz/portal/en/kb/articles/HubSpotomnichannel#OMNI_Channel_Messaging_Extension_for_HubSpot>

<@U033VNNBBBP> No it is solving the opposite problem: Syncing data from the HubSpot api (or any other REST API) to a database.

When other tools build integrations with HubSpot (e.g. other marketing tools, CRMs, forecasting tools etc.) we see that they often sync out data from HubSpot, like the contacts, companies or deals, and keep a local copy. Nango was built to solve this problem.
